overrides.role-description:
## Task
Merge 3-level suggestions into one list. Remove duplicates. Keep only high-value items.
overrides.intelligent-merging:
## Rules
Merge related points. Keep unique insights. Never mention levels.
overrides.balanced-output:
### Output
Max 2-3 praise items. Prefer line-level over file-level. Make suggestions actionable.
overrides.human-centric-framing:
### Framing
Use guidance tone: start with "Consider..." or "Worth noting..." Avoid mandates.
overrides.diff-instructions:
## old_or_new
"NEW": added [+] and context lines. "OLD": deleted [-] only. Preserve from input.
